item.title: Mysqli is homo
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Seems that after the session_start() it is NULL[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2008, 05:58:23 AM[/size][hr]Nevermind, it’s NULL at the beginning of writeSession.

[code]
openSession: object(mysqli)#1 (0) { }
readSession: object(mysqli)#1 (0) { }

Warning: session_start() [function.session-start]: Cannot send session cache limiter - headers already sent (output started at /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php:67) in /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php on line 72
Alone: object(mysqli)#1 (0) { }

writeSession: NULL

Warning: mysqli_real_escape_string() expects parameter 1 to be mysqli, null given in /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php on line 36

Warning: mysqli_real_escape_string() expects parameter 1 to be mysqli, null given in /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php on line 36

Warning: mysqli_query() expects parameter 1 to be mysqli, null given in /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php on line 37

Warning: mysqli_affected_rows() expects parameter 1 to be mysqli, null given in /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php on line 39
closeSession: NULL

Warning: mysqli_close() expects parameter 1 to be mysqli, null given in /home/pwnds0/public_html/upload/php/sessions.inc.php on line 14[/code]

Read full topic
